title: Editor UI Panels (Tool Palette + Color Picker)

criteria.text: Tool palette renders with selectable tool icons
criteria.notes: ToolPalette struct with per-stage tools, render() and handle_click() methods

criteria.text: Property panel shows per-stage sliders and controls
criteria.notes: PropertyPanel with rebuild_for_stage(), stage-specific sliders using UISlider

criteria.text: HSV color picker works for color selection
criteria.notes: HsvColorPicker with SV box (16x16 grid), hue bar, recent colors, drag handling

checklist.item: Create EditorUI/ui_panels module for UI rendering
Implement tool palette with selectable icons
Implement property panel with per-stage sliders
Implement HSV color picker for color selection

worker_notes: Created ui_panels.rs with ToolPalette (per-stage tool buttons with icons/shortcuts, hit-testing), PropertyPanel (stage-specific UISlider configs, rebuild_for_stage), and HsvColorPicker (16x16 SV grid, 24-step hue bar, recent colors, drag handling, hsv_to_rgba conversion). All rendering uses add_quad/draw_text from game::ui::text. cargo check passes for both battle_editor and battle_arena with 0 errors.
learnings: mod.rs had been updated by other workers (canvas_2d, orbit_camera, undo, variety modules added) - needed to re-read before editing
UISlider is Copy+Clone so can be stored in Vec without lifetime issues
The draw_text function takes &str so we convert single chars via byte arrays and std::str::from_utf8
